words_with_descriptions.climb: The sport or activity of ascending mountains or cliffs.
words_with_descriptions.pole: Refers to pole vaulting, a track and field event where a participant uses a long, flexible pole as an aid to jump over a high bar.
words_with_descriptions.row: The act of propelling a boat using oars.
words_with_descriptions.race: A competition of speed, in which participants try to finish a set course in the shortest time possible.
words_with_descriptions.scuba: An activity involving underwater diving with the use of self-contained underwater breathing apparatus.
words_with_descriptions.sprint: A short race run at full speed.
words_with_descriptions.chip: A short, lofted shot in golf, where the ball pops quickly into the air.
words_with_descriptions.dive: The act of jumping into water head-first, also a technique in football to simulate being fouled.
